about.title: Our 3-Man-Squad
about.paragraph: We are a UK based app developing collective armed with a wide spread of digital skills, ready to deliver fun and entertainment. Our recent leaps in progress have allowed us to offer in-organisation project optimisations and idea realisations. It's simple, if you have a good idea for an app, talk to us.

projects.title: Our Latest Apps
projects.paragraph: At the very moment you can find three of our latest apps at the Play Store and App Store. We do not only specialise in entertainment, but educational tools as well. Negative Harmony is one of them, currently a leading circle-of-fifths-based music producing tool on the market.
